Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.model.sprite

Class SpriteModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.model.sprite.SpriteModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BallModel, BrickModel, PaddleModel, PowerUpModel
public abstract class SpriteModel extends Object
The abstract Model for the Sprite MVC.
It stores the generic data that all sprites will have and provides some basic functionality for controller to modify the state/property of the sprite.
See Also:
SpriteController, SpriteView

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteModel

      protected SpriteModel​(javafx.geometry.Point2D location)
      Constructor to initialise the properties of the model and set the location of the sprite.
      Also adds listener to the location property to update the X and Y location whenever the location of the sprite changed
      Parameters:
      location - the starting location of the sprite
